website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for an all-cotton, quality sheet set that resists wrinkles.
pros: A great cotton sheet set that washes well, doesn't wrinkle easily, and offers quality and comfort
Users report being very satisfied with the thickness of these sheets as well
cons: A few felt that these were stiffer than some other brands, and a few experienced issues with pilling after several washes

customer_reviews.title: Not the same sheets I ordered last year, disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets this time last year and I loved them. They were silky and soft and they fit my king size bed perfectly. I reordered these sheets and they are not the same. The ones I just received are rough, they feel cheap. They also don't fit my bed (same exact bed) as well. I'm disappointed. In the picture, the old sheet is on the left and the new sheet is on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Troche

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sheets
customer_reviews.text: The sheets feels like a superior quality. I liked the material and the quality of the thread counts. Overall satisfied with the product. Updated to 5, after using the product for some days now. Maintains quality after multiple washes.
customer_reviews.author: Navyanth Gowda

customer_reviews.title: Love These Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets in white/queen size. I absolutely love them. They are so comfortable and they wash up great with very little wrinkling. I'm thinking about upgrading to a king size bed, and this is where I will come to buy all my new sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: NO customer support PLUS damaged purchase
customer_reviews.text: My light grey queen set arrived "tye dyed" with what looks like BLEACH. The entire four piece set is horrid. I emailed California Design Den and they will not respond. Since I was in desperate need of sheets, I am currently using them. Do NOT buy from them IF you really need sheets. This is the worst online purchase I have had in over ten years; I shop for everything online, so I have hundreds of great purchases to back this assessment. CDD you are the WORST. (P.S. I have never written an ugly review AND I give you 10 NEGATIVE stars for customer service.)
customer_reviews.author: GracieMae

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A DISAPPOINTMENT!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets came and I washed them as directed, put them on the bed and was so happy with the way they fit. They were not soft but not scratchy and I assumed they would soften up after a few more washes. Fast forward 2 weeks to wash #3 & they are getting color spots! The spots look like bleach spots but I dont even have bleach or anything with bleach in it in my house! I am so upset! Would send back but I have thrown out the packaging and slept on them. Do NOT waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Karie Sturdevant

customer_reviews.title: Sheet fitting is great. Product is clearly as per description
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have a sheet set of high thread count with reasonable pricing .This set serves both.Sheet fitting is great .Product is clearly as per description. I would highly recommend it . I hope it comes in other bright colors too.
customer_reviews.author: SRG

customer_reviews.title: If you love wrinkles you will love these
customer_reviews.text: I got suckered in when I read some of the positive reviews. I washed exactly as stated on the package. They came out to be a wrinkled mess. I then proceeded to iron with steam and there was no change. They looked just as bad as the “before.” These are hideous looking and going back for return... feel stupid that I purchased these
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: These sheets are soft enough and they fit my mattress ...
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are soft enough and they fit my mattress well. However the pillow cases are a bit on the small size and do not cover the ends of my standard size pillows as much as they should.
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Corner seem split
customer_reviews.text: Update: I contacted the seller directly and they are sending me a replacement fitted sheet. What great Customer Service! I would definitely buy from them again. Original: I wanted to love these sheets. I wanted 100% cotton because they hold up better and less likely to pill. But while putting on the fitted sheet the corner seem split right open. So now I have to go through the whole return process when all I need is a replacement fitted sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal J. Kuenzler

customer_reviews.title: Fitted Sheet isn't Fitted
customer_reviews.text: I've had this sheet set for 6 months now, and I'm so tired of having to pull down the sheet at the corners every singly night. The fitted sheet actually fits the first night after washing it, and then it stretches out and bunches up. I've even tried getting ties that help fitted sheets stay on better, and it does nothing for this one. I don't think it's a a depth issue of my mattress either because the seams line up well. I wish I could return this, or at least not feel bad about buying another sheet set. Now I'm just concerned that my next sheet will do the exact same thing.
customer_reviews.author: martin  a  wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Great price, nice quality, but a couple of issues to note.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sheet set, fits the bed well, good color and texture. The pillow cases are slightly smaller than regular sized cases, so the end of one of my foam pillows tends to hang out of the case a bit. Also one area of the fitted sheet had a messy thread spot flaw of about 2 inches. Other than these things, I am very happy with my purchase and feel the sheets were a great price. Love the color! Matches a comforter I have perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Fitted sheet is awful.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets have a major flaw. The elastic in the fitted sheet is so weak that it constantly pulls out at the corners--in other words, refuses to stay tucked under the mattress. As a result, every night I have to put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: CUT  so  poorly... these will def not last  nothing worse than an unsquare bed sheet
customer_reviews.text: LOOKED GREAT OUTTA THE PACKAGE BUT THE PROOF IS ' AFTER THE WASH ' that's when the irregularities show up its totally cut bad.. not a square piece of cloth of sheets or pillow cases...and the cases are too small for modern pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick H.

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed in these
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed in these. They're shiner/more slippery/more silky than I expected or would prefer. I purposely bought 400 thread count, not higher, in hopes of being more of a cotton/twill texture and not so satin smooth. But if you want silky, you'll like these. The color got bleached spots immediately from contact with skin moisturizer, which happens, but usually not this fast or obvious on other sheets.
customer_reviews.author: SG in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Superior quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these sheets! I've purchased two sets so far, and am very happy with both! So smooth, soft, and comfy! As for the review about the PILLOWCASES having pocket on one side, they are made that way purposely to KEEP YOUR PILLOWS IN! Yet another mark of the high quality! The fitted sheets are also sewn to last- the elastic is sewn in so well under layers of the sheet fabric folded around it- these will not be coming apart like cheap sheets with exposed elastic edges.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I have ever given a review of 1 until now. I received these sheets on July 11, 2019. Here is a picture of them today. See the fade lines! I've never had sheets do this before. I have other sheet sets that I interchange. I guess you get what you pay for. VERY poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Look good but texture is not smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Well... I don't always go by negative reviews as people all have different opinions but these sheets are NOT smooth like any of our other sheets. We're just used to sheets that are silky smooth and these are simply not. I don't hate the rougher texture but it's not as comfortable. They appear to be ok quality but a rougher texture means lower quality cotton so I doubt they will last long but then the price is really low and I got what I paid for. And by the way, I always wash per instructions so the texture is from the low quality cotton and not how I am washing/drying them.
customer_reviews.author: Rivka

customer_reviews.title: Beware of pillow cases!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are very good quality. However I probably would not have purchased these sheets if I had know how the pillow cases were sewn. The fact that one side of the opening is not stitched down is ridiculous! I didn't notice this until after I washed the set, or I might have returned them. I am very disappointed. Please make very clear in your Amazon listing that the pillow case openings are NOT stitched properly!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: They actually fit my 15 inch Winkbed Plus which is every bit 16 inches in sheet dynamics
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy ,so glad not to be lied to, they feel good, they wash great. Ok now im looking for more colors my only concern is if the other colors have the same dimensions , i will update to be sure, the pillow cases not being completely stitched down on the inner flap of some cases is an issue , but not enough to stop the purchase, DOLLAR FOR DOLLAR comparing against others on the market , these sheets win in price and in quality period; . , but send it back if pillowcases arent stitched down. Enough returns and im sure they will fix that isuue, i own 4 sets
customer_reviews.author: TOPTECH

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Very crisp and comfortable when new. Now after 5 months becoming noticeably thinner with minor pilling, scratchiness, and faded color. Don't think these sheets will last much longer. UPDATE: Fitted sheet tore after 8 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheets but what happened to the pillowcases???
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 6-piece set in the peachy blush color. They arrived yesterday, and I was so excited that they were the absolute perfect color for my daughter’s boho themed room. I threw away the box they came in because there wasn’t the slightest thought of needing to return them. I went to wash them this morning only to find 2 weird looking bluish-gray stains-one on each of 2 of the pillow cases. The other 2 do not have them. Now I can’t even ship them back-which I really don’t want to have to do anything. Is there any way to just get pillow cases? SO disappointed I paid extra to get the 2 additional cases.
customer_reviews.author: Spearfsh11

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend I'd you want crisp comfy sheets!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am highly surprised by the bad reviews on these sheets. We love them!!! We also understand the difference between microfiber and cotton which I think some people dont...hence the bad reviews. These sheets feel so crisp and they are not overly hot. Will buy again when we need replacements, but they are excellent quality so I think it will be a while. As for wrinkles, they dont bother us...and if I had got them from the dryer when they turned off they probably would not have wrinkled ,but I left them for a while. I would strongly recommend these sheets. We have had them for almost one month with no issues. The chocolate color is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible  sheets
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for over a year now. I have washed dried them at least a dozen times hoping they would soften up, as is claimed in the description. They are STILL scratchy, stiff and slide off the bed. I hated them so much I finally threw them away. NO idea why the high ratings on these. I've had other cotton sateen sheets and they were never like that, even right out of the package. I wasted my money. Don't waste yours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty unimpressed with these sheets. These are the first cotton sheets I’ve purchased that are scratchy. Reviews stating otherwise are older. The wrinkles don’t necessarily bother me, but I’d hoped for better for $50. I am a pet owner that doesn’t allow pets on my bed, and these sheets somehow have pet hair all over them that absolutely refuses to come off in the very first day owning them. The almost $50 price tag is outrageous. Will be sticking with microfiber that has durability, cheaper price, and wicks off the pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: YeahMan

customer_reviews.title: Wash them differently and they are great!!
customer_reviews.text: These were soft right out of the package but still irritated my skin a little bit. I did a little research and found out that sheets often have stiffening/starching agents to make them look very sleek and wrinkle free. Washing with detergent traps these in. If you wash them with baking soda instead and add some vinegar to the fabric softener section it removes those agents. After doing that a couple of times I absolutely love the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: MkoKro

customer_reviews.title: No one makes good sheets
customer_reviews.text: As usual sheets made today are absolute crap. Third manufacturer I have tried. How hard can it be to make a rectangular piece of cloth that fits. All sheet sets made 20 years ago were awesome. New ones wrinkle, are like burlap and are too large based on any order I have placed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets, thick and seem durable.
customer_reviews.text: I may not be washing mine as often as other reviewers but I have not experienced the ripping and fraying several have mentioned. These aren't the most angelic soft sheets in the universe but I honestly enjoy their tactile feel a lot, it is still very smooth and always feels clean, and they feel substantial. I have slept in other kinds of sheets that always feel greasy somehow even after washing, but these maintain that crisp clean feeling really well.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Super Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sheets! They are really much more than I expected. I love the natural fibers and the no-dye on them. I love how they are made and how well made they are! Our bed is a handmade bed from Germany, and is an odd size for American products; however, the king sized sheets work great! These sheets are really soft, and they appear satiny; I appreciate the naturalness of the materials and the processing of how they are made. I will definitely be ordering more! Super fast shipping, really good packaging, and all in all, just a wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.author: PalmettoGirl

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL CHEMICAL
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL CHEMICAL POISON SMELL THAT FOES NOT WASH OUT!!! I wish I read more of the one star reviews before I purchase these because there are many people that are saying the same thing. The sheets are hard not soft and definitely are not with the stated in the description as far as the thread count and what they are made of. The chemical smell is so strong and awful it has to be poisonous to humans and animals I am returning these immediately and I’ve notified Amazon as well that these are poisonous sheets
customer_reviews.author: Old school Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Very nice basic sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful sheets. We washed them as directed & have been using them the past few nights. I am impressed with how wrinkle- free they actually are. Pillow cases do not need ironing & wrinkles on sheets are minimal. They are slightly less “silky” than I expected but still comfortable. They may get softer with more washings. Love the “head or foot” tag provided! No guessing & then getting it wrong & having to start over. They are sewn well & appear that they will hold up nicely. Beautifully packaged with use and care information. Overall, I am pleased & think they are a quite a good value. I would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: JMinGHWA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Washed before using...pretty scratchy after washing but not too big of a deal....however, every single time you move at night the sheets rustle like paper. I can hear the rustling in other parts of the house. Super loud and annoying. The only other time that I had sheets do this were the super cheap ones from walmart and not something that I spent $40 a set on.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Product description is wrong !
customer_reviews.text: In the product description, it said that 4 sets or pieces of Bed sheet and also in product information as number of 4 pieces. So I think that it included 4 sets of queen size bed sheets. No ! It is wrong They have only 1 piece of bed sheet, 2 pieces of pillow case and one fitted sheet. Their product information is cheated
customer_reviews.author: Hnin S. Khin

customer_reviews.title: Really just meh, so-so
customer_reviews.text: These sheets did not impress me for being 50 bucks. I feel as if they were of the quality of 20 dollar sheets i usually buy from amazon. After washing on a gentle cycle immediately after they arrived and then drying on low heat, it felt as if the softness became more harsh. They were put on my bed immediately after the dryer cycle ended. Just covered in small wrinkles. And it leaves me confused because I treat my less expensive sheets to the exact same washing and drying treatment and have yet to experience the amount of wrinkles I have with these sheets. Will most likely be returning these sheets, they just really left me wanting a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey eliz

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing like pure cotton
customer_reviews.text: I did not rate Wrinkle Free as I line dry my sheets, not in the dryer. Always a few wrinkles when line dried but I don't iron them like my Grandmother did. *smile* These are very comfortable. The only thing I add to the sheets is four small colored stitches on the bottom right corner in order to find the correct way to put the sheets on right The First Time. I don't like spinning them around to figure out which end is up. *smile again* I would buy again and would recommend. Thanks for making a great sustainable product.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Some minor flaws .. UPDATE 6/14/2019
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the slate gray and the color is exactly as featured. I followed the directions as to washing and tumble dry. Though not completely wrinkle free I am satisfied with the after wash look. I have only owned these for only a few months and unfortunately a tear has appeared on the flat sheet. Overall I'm satisfied UPDATE 6/14/2019 KUDDOS to this Vendor. They reached out to me and corrected the situation IMMEDIATELY. Excellent customer appreciation.
customer_reviews.author: JohnFrancis

customer_reviews.title: So much pilling
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I had these sheets delivered February 18th, 2020 and already they have started pilling like crazy. We have washed them about 3 times in the month and a half that we have owned them and have strictly followed the washing directions on the sheets. They were nice when we first bought them, however, now they are starting to pill on the fitted sheet. I would not recommend these to anyone. I really don't know why these sheets have gotten so many good reviews, please read this and consider the 1-2 Star reviews before you buy these just so you know what you are getting into.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets - fit thick mattress
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. We bought these sheets because of the good reviews - particularly those that said the fitted sheet would fit a thick mattress without problems. We were not disappointed. The sheets are high quality. They are soft and washed well. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: JWB

customer_reviews.title: Abrasive on my face??
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in anticipation it would be soft as everyone mentioned but after washing and drying, they became rougher. The first night, I had to use no pillow because I found them abrasive on my face. My husband also said the same thing. When I first got them out the box, they felt really nice and soft but once washing that’s when they became rougher. I’m hoping as I wash them over time, they will become softer as other reviews mention. Will update later. But so far, the sheets are abrasive :(
customer_reviews.author: Lilita

customer_reviews.title: They are cotton and incredibly soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Slept in my amazing 400 count cotton sheets for the first time last night! These are made for a queen! I purchased the white and they are brilliant white, soft, comfy and fit my 12" mattress like a charm! I'm a big fan and I'll definitely be back for other colors. They do wrinkle a little but I actually like that...I mean they are cotton! They washed beautifully and putin dryer with my wool balls infused with drops of lavender essential oil. Absolute heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Rockingrammie

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Fit Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on this product & thought it would be perfect. Unfortunately, when I finally went to put the sheets on the bed, the bottom fitted sheet WOULD NOT fit!!! 2 of us tugged & pulled to no avail. It is too late to return. So, I am out $42----the bottom sheet is no good to me. I ordered the full. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Ann

customer_reviews.title: COTTON
customer_reviews.text: So, while I rated this product low for wrinkle-free and softness, I gave it a 5 star review as I don't care if the sheets have wrinkles and a little bit of fabric softener and time will take care of the softness factor. These sheets breathe so you don't get overheated! I made the mistake of purchasing other sheets that were microfiber and oh my goodness they were soft, but they did not breathe so I kept waking up overheated. Not these! These breathe! :)
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: I just spent $50 on a set of sheets that didn’t last one month
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and figured that these might be worth the price. I was dead wrong. While they are somewhat comfortable, they wrinkle horribly. Worse than anything though is that after only two washings, I already have one rip, and two thinning spots. In short, I just spent $50 on a set of sheets that didn’t last one month.
customer_reviews.author: The Ghost of Old J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues
customer_reviews.text: These sheets look good a d feel good. But tge wuality is not good. I ordered two sets in sept 2019, by dec 2019 i noticed both fitted sheets developed and holeabout the size of a quarter. I was annoyed and asked my wife what happened. She did jot know. So we swapped out sheets for 2nd set, and lo and behold same hole in same spot. Also tge elastic does not fitred sheet onto our mattress. Of course its past return window, i am hoping seller qill read this and send me two sets of replacement sheets. I hope its just a bad batch.....
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Billings

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, there was a long blue streak stain (12+ ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, there was a long blue streak stain (12+ inches long), and a short blue streak stain (about half an inch) on the fitted sheet. The washing instructions advise to *not* use bleach, so am not sure how this stain would be removed if I just chose to wash them. A label came with the package stating that each item is carefully inspected to ensure there are no defects--this was not the case with my item, unfortunately. I will be ordering from another seller. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JMW

customer_reviews.title: Toxic chemicals in sheets
customer_reviews.text: I started using this sheet set and duvet cover without washing first (somethings I've done in the past with other brands and had no issues) and woke up with a migraine and was ill every single day -- extreme fatigue, dehydration (drank 3x more water), runny nose, etc.. I never get migraines nor such symptoms, and don't have allergies, so this was unusual. After a week of feeling ill and some research, it clicked. First night without sheets, I felt significantly better. I then did a test by placing them back on bed, and symptoms returned following morning. This is infuriating. My body was poisoned with toxic chemicals. Some cheap brands cut corners at the expense of consumer's health.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Z

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, soft & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love the feeling of these sheets & after a few washes their softness really shines through. 7+ months and many washes later they’ve held up super well & show no signs of “pilling”. The pockets are nice and deep and have never come up off the bed & the little head/foot tags have come in really handy when making the bed. Most importantly, they’re comfortable! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Not Soft and Silky as Claimed
customer_reviews.text: The sheets we received were nowhere near being "soft and silky" as claimed - even before washing. They are perfectly fine sheets, but they get 2 stars because they were not as advertised (the advertising was emphatic about the soft and smooth sateen feel - this is not our impression at all). They are ok to sleep in, but they are not as described. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Voice of Zip

customer_reviews.title: Rough, uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Rough. Uncomfortable. I regret this purchase. I assumed wrong, that cotton would be soft. I dont need excessive softness, just a bit. These sheets have none. They have deep pockets, as claimed. My lavendar triangle pattern was not thin. Will they soften over time with washes? I hope so

customer_reviews.title: Good Pricepoint for Middle of the Road Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets for my daughter’s bed. The price point is fantastic, but please be aware these are middle of the road sheets, not luxury linens. The sheet set we ordered was a percale type feel to it (crisper rather than a buttery soft). The sheets were also thinner than I was expecting and after one wash, were showing signs of pilling. They also show wrinkles, which encourages my daughter to make her bed, so this is could actually be a positive. I would not like these sheets for my bed because they are not my preferred softness and they are thinner than I like. However, my daughter likes these sheets and I liked the price for the set.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cotton sheets
customer_reviews.text: Washed the sheets right after receipt and am highly impressed with the quality. The cotton material is soft and feels great on the skin. Never again will I buy another microfiber anything..... Don't expect wrinkle-free, these are cotton sheets, but I took them out of the dryer immediately and they flattened out nicely. Can highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: IMPC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable in the U.S. Southeast and good value
customer_reviews.text: This order was a reorder of the same sheets, in a different size for a different room, because I was so pleased with the first order. These sheets feel and look like hotel sheets, so if you are interested in softness or totally wrinkle free, these sheets are not for you. But if you live in a hot, humid part of the U.S., these sheets cannot be beat for comfort at a good price Also, they thoughtfully put a tag on the appropriate side of the bottom sheet, so you know what goes at the foot/head, eliminating the most frustrating part of bottom sheets. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: D&PM

customer_reviews.title: These sheets are not sateen.
customer_reviews.text: I think these sheets may have been treated with something. They do not feel like all cotton sheets. I would return them, but I recently moved long distance with very few things, and because of the Covid-19 Pandemic, I can not return to get the rest of my things. Anyhow, I did not have a pair of sheets that fit my new bed. These do fit nice and the bottom sheet stays nicely tucked in, without shifting. I am hopeful that they will wear-in and begin to feel softer and more like all cotton sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Warm sheets, not very wide
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these. The fitted sheet is pretty good and has a good band that keeps it pretty snug. The top sheet is the problem with this set though. It is very short on either side of the bed (Queen size, memory foam mattress), and it barely hits past the sides of the mattress. So when you are in bed, the sheet pulls up and you fight with it all night. The other thing I’m not a fan of, is that these sheets seem to get WARM. They are not a cool cotton, and it seems like they absorb and reflect the heat, then hold it in.
customer_reviews.author: bmhnpb

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as I what I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.text: Wishful thinking is that I hoped the sheets would feel just like they do when the package is opened. Then, after washing, reality sets in and I hoped they would be as smooth and soft as the ones I was replacing. My bad, because I didn't check the thread count of the sheets I was replacing before I ordered these sheets. My old ones were 650 thread count and these are 400. I hope that they will soften up a bit after more washings. The quality is excellent and they fit my 14" thick memory foam mattress like a glove. I will buy this brand again but with a higher thread count next time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Details I appreciate: * box was made was recycled materials * fitted bottom sheet has tag "head or foot of bed" (how often does one struggle on this like me), ample depth for deep mattress, ample size pillow cases (many barely fit standard pillow cases), washing instructions "do NOT fry the sheets in super hot dryer; take out quickly to diminish wrinkling". Price is more than fair for softness, details mentioned above. I have paid waaaay more than this price with waaaay less satisfaction. RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Finally - deep enough for thick mattress!
customer_reviews.text: First set I've found with deep-enough fitted corners! Have tried many others that claimed to fit but came up short, especially after washing. Everything else is as described. White is a true, normal white. Washes well too! *It's been a few months since this review and I want to add a comment about how the sheets wear. I was really surprised to find that even after the first month they began pilling in the areas of most wear, even light wear. I've never seen that before with other brands. What a shame :(
customer_reviews.author: LabNurse

customer_reviews.title: Not soft or comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After multiple washes, following manufacturers directions (don't dry on high heat, etc.), these sheets are still scratchy and rough. And, they are not cool and breathable. So much for 100% cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good sheets for the price
customer_reviews.text: They’re nice sheets and a good value. Of course they’re not going to be the softest sheets you’ve ever slept on for only 45 shmackos, but they get the job done and they look nice. And they’re not that microfiber bullsheet that makes ya sweat like a whore in church. Get the sheets. They’re not gonna disappoint you. But listen, if you have an extra $20 to splurge, go ahead & treat yourself to the 6hundo thread count.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, but not a premium feel
customer_reviews.text: The main thing these sheets have to recommend them is their low price. It's a good value, but let's be clear: you will not be receiving high-end sheets. These are acceptably soft but nothing remarkable. Drying them on a low temperature cycle will help, but I am highly skeptical that these will ever have a premium feel, even after they've been completely broken in. This product has a lot of gushing reviews that seem quite hyperbolic, based on my experience so far. Buy these if you're on a budget. If you value premium softness, just accept you're going to have to pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Drischord

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit on 18" Mattress
customer_reviews.text: We have rather high mattress, approx. 18" high. Whereas previous sheet kept pulling up at the corners, this one has roomy pockets, and an extra strip of elastic on the corner to keep it on place. And it has stayed in place, even after washing. I like that the sides, and bottom are labeled. Being 100% cotton, it did not surprise me that they came out of the dryer wrinkled, but certainly, on a mattress those wrinkles don't last long. Finally, they were packaged very nicely.. I do recommend these sheets for people with tall mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets, not overly soft though and pockets aren't that deep
customer_reviews.text: I get hot/sweat easily when sleeping so I heard about trying cotton instead of microfiber. Also need large pockets for my mattress- these do fit my 10" bed but they would not fit anything larger! The color is nice and they are comfortable, I do think they are a bit more breathable than microfiber. I personally however, don't like how shiny they are. I really prefer a jersey knit type sheet which these are not. They are like smooth/shiny cotton instead of that really soft t-shirt type cotton
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle H

customer_reviews.title: Love these sheets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these becausde the description mentioned that they were manufactured by a socially-conscious company in India, and I like to support such enterprises. But my social conscience has been rewarded, because the sheets are excellent: the pattern is charmong, and the fabric is soft and comfortable. (I do wish that the washing instructions offered in this e-mail had been included with the sheets. I did prewash them, but not as recommended here.)
customer_reviews.author: M. Roeder

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and CHEAP!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these! The are very thin. They are super scratchy and feel super cheap. I have bought better sheets at target. They don't even fit. They are so loose and baggy. I have no idea how these have so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have held off reviewing this set of sheets to see how much shrinkage occurred when laundered. So many other sheets I have purchased shrunk so much that they were useless. I was delighted that shrinkage with this set was minimal, wrinkling was average. I was all set to give these 5 stars until I put one of the pillowcases on and noticed a 3-4 inch split in the seam. They had never been used. Apparently quality control is lacking since the split in the seam was easily visible. I am not returning these as I can repair the seam myself and save the hassle, but that shouldn’t be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Forget about it
customer_reviews.text: Sheets pulled apart and ripped first time using them, very cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Nice quaility, love the gray color, wrinkle more easily than blended fabric sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Quality and feel of the sheets is really good and the gray color is very nice. The only down side is once washed, because they are 100% cotton, I have to iron them if I want them to look crisp on the guest room beds. All the guests have been super pleased with the feel of the 100% cotton sheets, just wish I didn't have to iron them to have them look as good as they feel!!! Am going to try adding liquid starch, that you can put in the washing machine, to see if that will allow them to come out of the dryer less wrinkled looking!
customer_reviews.author: Liz L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent REAL Cotton Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I live in the northeast and my family and I use cotton sheets in the summer and flannel in the winter. Real cotton sheets, like these, are soft and smooth for the summer months. They are breathable and help keep you cool. Don’t go with oddly high thread count sheets like 800, 1600, etc. Those are microfiber sheets and are NOTHING like cotton sheets. They may be soft at first but they will pill and wear out quickly. The small threads needed to achieve that high thread count will not last. Go with heavier, sturdier cotton sheets and you’ll be glad you did! Plus because of the extra durability, you’ll buy less sheets and save money in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Seeing many good reviews, I decided to try this 400 TC pure cotton sheet set. What I've found is a very rough, thick sheet, with an amazing amount of wrinkles that even ironing can not correct. When the sheets come out of a dryer, they look like a prune, there are so many wrinkles. And the quality: I think the smoothness is somewhere between tent fabric and a flour sack; they are not soft, smooth, or light. They are stiff and after 3 washings, are still stiff and wrinkled. Not at all satisfied with these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Sheets inside didn’t match the box
customer_reviews.text: I received this box with a warehouse “great deals on quality used items” on it. Nothing in the description indicated these would be used. When I opened the box, the sheets were “full” size, not queen. As the photo shows, the label is also for 60% cotton, whereas the sheets are advertised as 100% cotton. Obviously, I’m returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shade

customer_reviews.title: Pill balled in less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets were purchased by mistake. I did not realize they were not 100% cotton. I needed sheets as guests were arriving and so I figured I would try them. They do not feel like cotton. They feel synthetic. They are wrinkle-free and are smooth but who cares when they got pill balls after less than 5 washings. I would return them, but the time limit has passed.
customer_reviews.author: knittedpiecrust

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant buying these sheets because of a few reviews claiming they were rough and uncomfortable. I was looking for soft, pure cotton sheets at an affordable price, and because of how inexpensive these are I didn't expect too much from them. But WOW, they are really soft. They may not be the highest thread count but they're certainly good enough to be extremely comfortable, and I have sensitive skin. They got a bit wrinkled in the wash but after putting them on my bed they smoothed out quickly, and fit my mattress well. Another bonus is that they're much better for the environment than microfiber. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anni

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great product
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are as good as others that cost twice as much: nice sheen, good color, the fabric has a nice heft to it that says “quality,” but the best part has been the company itself. After purchase they emailed me to make sure I like my new sheets and to advise me on caring for them. They also seem to have very high ethical standards, and pay their employees fairly. I will buy my sheets from them as long as they’re in business.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Remmert

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Dreams
customer_reviews.text: My body thanks me every morning for buying these sheets. Soft, relatively thick yet lightweight at the same time, they remain cool during the high desert summer nights. I use no AC at night, so coolness is a big deal. No waking up sweating and throwing off the covers; no pilling or snagging by my snaggly toenails; no skimpy tuck-ins. Follow the detailed directions and wrinkles will be kept to a minimum. I need my beauty sleep, and knowing that these sheets didn't cost an arm and a leg really helps me sleep soundly. PS - Thanks to a mild case of OCD, you can be sure that I researched and compared all products before selecting these. Sweet dreams!
customer_reviews.author: santay

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets, trustworthy company! I’ve already purchased a duvet cover from this company too.
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets!! I wish I could afford every color. I did my research before purchasing because I wanted to replace all the bedding in our home with GOTS certified and Oeko-Tex standard bedding. Living in a low toxin environment is important. This company makes a great product. I have washed the sheets multiple times now, and the quality is still intact. I feel they are soft, comfortable and cool to sleep on. I dry on low heat and take out right away and haven’t really had much wrinkling at all. I purchased the ivory king size set and the color goes with everything and they fit my mattress with plenty of room to spare, without looking too big.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff carroll

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it has come to this. I’m 45 and writing a review on sheets. Only because these sheets are FANTASTIC. I’ve purchased 4 pair and they are cottony soft luxury. They stay cool - no microfiber crap. The pocket corners are deep. They wash up really nice- no pilling. They label the head/foot (don’t be snarky you know you’ve been there-wondering what’s wrong with you needing 10 mins to get the sheets on and thinking “man it sure would be nice if they labeled the head/foot”). Well my friends, problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: LadyJane

customer_reviews.title: NOT made in India!
customer_reviews.text: I read the question and answer section and they stated that they were made in India. I decided to purchase them and the packaging said "MADE IN CHINA"! I am very disappointed and upset about the misleading and false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod K.

customer_reviews.title: Pillow cases are way too small.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with saying that i love the sheets, they are exactly what i wanted. what i didn't want to do is have to buy a separate pair of pillowcases that cost nearly half as much as the entire set. That's ridiculous. but alas i had to because the queen size pillow cases might be the smallest pillow cases i've ever seen. the king size ones are well over the length that's actually needed to fit a king size pillow, so why aren't the queen size ones the same?
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: First I love the purple color of these sheets. I was unsure buying them online cause you just never know what the actual color will look like....its a deep, rich, beautiful color. They are very well made! As for the comfort, I washed them immediately (surprisingly they didn't bleed) and there are zero wrinkles but they're not as soft as I hoped but then these are just 400 t.c. Don't get me wrong they're soft i just hoped for more. I also purchased the 800 t.c. which arrive today. I'm sure they'll feel amazing since the lower t.c. are. You definitely can't beat the price especially for such good quality. I paid much more at Target for very similar sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Adenton67

customer_reviews.title: Sublime!
customer_reviews.text: Have had some pretty nice sheets before, but these by far beat them all. Tried some microfiber sheets, but they were really hot. And some mixed with cotton and they were pretty much the same. These are in the goldilocks zone. Super soft and cool to sleep on and in. Washed them twice before first use. And followed the manufacturer washing and drying instructions and they came out prefect. Don't over dry or use high heat. Pull them out right away and came out looking and feeling amazing. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Weston Milmoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Well made, comfy, attractive cotton sheets. Pros: Soft, absorbent, warm but breathable, ample fit for oversize mattresses (mine's about 10" thick), appear to be legit 400 thread count, true sateen finish Cons: None, really, though they did have strong fabric-sizing aroma out of the package, which went away in 1 washing on Cold. Other: I can't comment on durability, haven't had them long enough. These did wrinkle somewhat but they're not 'permanent press' and I left them in the dryer after the cycle. They've been given a thorough test-sleeping and they passed, more comfortable than microfiber sheets I've bought and far better than anything I got from a 'market with walls'...
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets , could have been a 5
customer_reviews.text: I would have given the sheets a 5 but they were shipped in a box with no other protection other than the box itself , no plastic just a thin cardboard box. The box broke and the sheets got dirty and so needed to be washed before being put on the bed. One more thing , the sheets are comfortable but do attract lint and cat hair. Overall, the sheets are a good quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, heavyweight cotton (but not like canvas!)
customer_reviews.text: I’m the kind of person who leaves dry linens in my dryer til I need it again, so the fact that they’re wrinkle-prone doesn’t matter to me in the least. These are soft, substantial cotton, like the orphan flat sheet I stole from my parents house when I moved. I washed them first, and they’ve been thru the cycle a few times now with no visible deterioration. Nice texture, and with enough weight that they don’t feel flimsy. I bought a second set of them after a few weeks to replace a much thinner/stiffer sheet set I also had.
customer_reviews.author: Emoo

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in these sheets. When i opened the package they were exactly what I was hoping for - soft and silky feeling. Of course I washed them first before putting on the bed and ended up with what feels like very course and rough sheets!! Don't know how that could be but I know what it is - they feel like the cheap rough sheets I previously had.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Forget the cheap microfiber; 100% cotton is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these sheets! I was sick of the microfiber/fake cotton sheets due to the elastic wearing out quickly, pilling after a few washes, etc so I decided to go back to 100% cotton. I'm SO glad I did! You can immediately tell the difference in quality... they feel substantial (thicker), soft with strong elastic. Definitely worth spending a bit more! Forget about those microfiber sheets that wear out quickly... 100% is the way to go! Also, keep in mind; They will be wrinkled if you don't take them out of the dryer immediately after drying. I used high heat and had no problem. There were some wrinkles, but that's how true cotton is. Don't hesitate, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: This is my second order of these sheets
customer_reviews.text: Quite happy with these sheets and pillowcases. In fact, I bought a second set. They are extremely soft and comfy. There is enough sheet to fit great even on a thicker mattress, which I have. I bought white colored sheets so I can use a bit of bleach when I wash them, if I want to. I've noticed that when I get home from work, the cats now call it their bed more often than not hahaha. They must the sheets as well. Id love to buy extra pillow cases from the same company, but haven't found a link just yet at this writing.
customer_reviews.author: majormalfunction

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Sheets for a Nice Value
customer_reviews.text: I've now purchased three sets of these, and convinced my brother to buy a set. My husband and I sleep on them every night, and house guests also comment on how much they like them. The sheets wash well--take them out of the dryer when they're done, and they aren't all wrinkled up. I love cotton fabrics made in India, and these do not disappoint. Plus, they're made by a small business so that's a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Rosakins

customer_reviews.title: Manufactured in India & Mexico -- not the same fabric nor color
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Twin XL for my split King XL. I received two which are the same model 142099, but where manufactured in different countries; India and Mexico. The results was very different products. The Mexico product had a satin like texture, smooth, and felt thinner and cooler. Which is what we were looking for. The India product was rough, thicker, and a much lighter shade of purple. I suspect it would be warmer, but not tried it, yet. Outside of the stitching, they were totally different products that were overpriced to begin with. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Techore

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: 100% cotton sheets are my personal favorite. I bought the white queen set that has 2 pillowcases. The little wrinkling after drying does not bother me-- just a feature of pure cotton-- and these did not wrinkle as much as others I have had. They feel soft to me. The fitted sheet has elastic all around, so it was nice to see tags to show the head/foot to eliminate confusion when making the bed. I am very pleased with my purchase and would highly recommend this quality product. Nice to see that extra pillowcases can be purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: rwashopper

customer_reviews.title: Good king size sheet set for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are not the softest, nor silkiest, sheet set we have purchased, but this is an excellent set. After a few washings/drying's, there are no tears, loose threads, or worn/discolored spots. It is a minor complaint to me, but these sheets still come out of the drier very wrinkled. If you are a persons who must have wrinkle free sheets then this sheet set is not for you. Too me, the wrinkles are not an issue since they are covered by a comforter and a blanket (during the winter) so nobody knows they are wrinkled except my spouse and I.I would purchase these sheets again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JDDD

customer_reviews.title: Best service EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I received my 2nd set of sheets from California Design Den because I’d loved the first set so much. I discovered a small stain on the fitted sheet. I contacted the company on the email they provide and they asked me to try and clean it. So I did. Turns out it wasn’t a stain but likely a burn during the pressing process. They sent me a replacement set directly. I will at an APO address so amazon returns aren’t as easy as they are in the states. Anyway, best sheets I’ve found for the price. Super soft right out of the box. Very little wrinkles. And so smooth to the touch. I will never buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: djprozama

customer_reviews.title: Why sooo rough
customer_reviews.text: I like the color...I think the price is reasonable. I also chose this because it is cotton. But whyyy oh whyyy does it feel so rough on my skin? I tried to follow all the instructions about washing (dry don't fry) but it felt rough to the touch. It's not bad enough that it disrupts sleep but I just expected softer. I will revise the review if I notice anything else after a few more washes.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Don’t doubt it!  They are amazing sheets
customer_reviews.text: I will buy another pair soon. These sheets are soft and amazing. I hate hate hate microfiber sheets. So I was looking for cotton that wouldn’t break the bank. These are it. I suppose you could get a higher thread count. But why would you. These are great. I highly recommend. They fit my thick mattress with my mattress pad. I agree with the other review that said LOOK NO FURTHER. unless your a sheet snob. Lol. They are great sheets and I’ve washed them 4 times.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Aldred-Rand

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and Very Nice Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set in white over a year ago and loved them. I then decided to add an indigo blue set to my linens but they were nowhere near as nice as the first set. I wrote a review explaining this scenario and the seller contacted me and offered to replace the sheets for no cost. I received a brand new set of white sheets that are just as lovely as the first set I bought. Great customer service, and the sheets are wonderful--they are smooth, soft, wash well as long as you follow the care instructions (no high heat). 100 % recommend, especially after the kind replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Susann

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Comfy 100% Cotton
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with our new sheets. The color is a beautiful, almost robins egg blue, and they are soft and cool to sleep on. We prefer cotton sheets, but sometimes prices can be quite high for good quality. I feel that these were a reasonable cost and a good investment. They seem like they will last for a long time, are holding up well wash after wash and make for a great night of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought 2 sets
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3 stars for wrinkle free....they're cotton - there's going to be wrinkles. These sheets washed well and have just the right amount of softness. After washing, very little lint was in the dryer lint trap - a good sign that they, indeed, do have longer fiber strands in the individual threads. I am looking forward to seeing how well they hold up, but i suspect they will do just fine as they seem to be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Abyssinian Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: These sheets are awful
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets for my son. They are absolutely not sateen, I highly doubt they are 400 thread count. The label says 100% Egyptian Cotton, but I have my doubts tyere. They have a terrible texture/feel to them, not soft and silky as promised. I wouldn't be able to even sleep on them. The bottom sheet does not stay put well, they kind of move with you , instead of staying snug under you. They hold onto so much lint and the black has totally faded that they look terrible, too. After less than a year I have to get rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G.

customer_reviews.title: Uh-huh
customer_reviews.text: Microfiber might be soft, but I always feel like I'm suffocating from the outside and wind up kicking the sheets off all night long. But, cotton--how could you go wrong with cotton? Breathable, soft and durable, these remind me of the sheets I had as a kid that just get better and softer the longer you have them. I read in one review that someone felt they were stiff after washing them--as a cautionary note; don't over dry your sheets and you won't have this problem. If you accidentally fry them, just toss them back in the washer and wash them again but without detergent, then dry them. They'll be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: There’s tiny little details about these sheets and their packaging that I really appreciate as a designer. Care instructions are well outlined and there’s even little tabs to help you make your bed. These sheets are comfortable, they look great, and are basically everything I wanted when I ordered... but after owning these for several months now, they do sort of darken or stain unevenly and despite bleaching or soaking with different solutions I am not able to return them to the original white. Also, these are only wrinkle free until the 2nd or 3rd wash. I would absolutely buy these again, they are soft and very comfortable, but I’m considering getting a different color.
customer_reviews.author: :)virascencio

customer_reviews.title: Lovely soft sheets, excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a full size set on a lightening deal. They arrived quickly and are lovely, very soft. The packaging is impressive, really nice. There was a small error with the color but their excellent customer service responded to my inquiry immediately and went out of their way to correct it. I will buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: lovethebeach

customer_reviews.title: Buy these u wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are amazing. I wanted something that was comfy but not plastic feel and would fit my bed without coming off all the time. These have such great detail like a tag for the foot or head of the bed so u know which goes where. 100% cotton makes it even better. The little touches is what makes them great. Id recommend these to anyone. Very affordable ill be buying another color.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Cottrell

product_meta.title: 400-Thread-Count 100% Cotton Sheet Pure White Queen-Sheets Set, 4-Piece Long-staple Combed Cotton Best-Bedding Sheets For Bed, Breathable, Soft & Silky Sateen Weave Fits Mattress 16'' Deep Pocket
feature_bullets: 100% Natural Cotton, Soft and Comfy Sateen Sheets, Free from Harmful Chemicals
Eco-friendly & healthier than dust trapping artificial microfiber sheets. Imported
Trusted by 1 million+ delighted customers and reviewed by Oprah Magazine, CNN and other top sites.

HIGHEST QUALITY BEST COTTON SHEETS - New Better & Improved Version - If you love luxury and durability of hotel bed sheets and the look of crisp pillowcases, you’ll adore our Breathable Queen Sheets, 400-thread-count. We use yarns made with 100% long staple cotton fiber and a gorgeous sateen weave. Our eco-friendly sheets retain softness for a lifetime and resist fading. Indulge in soft bed sheets with detailed hem, available in Twin, Twin XL, Full, King and Cal King sizes

QUEEN Size Luxury 4pc Bed Sheets Set - 1 Flat Sheet: 90" W x 102" L; 1 Fully Elasticized Fitted Sheet: 60" W x 80" L + 16" Deep pocket on fitted sheet with superb all around elastic to fit low profile foam and tall mattresses and 2 Standard Pillowcases: 21" W x 30" L. Highest quality dye materials are used for fade resistance. Recommended for regular wash for superior softness

Extensive product checks and regular company audits ensure that the industry has a globally sustainable awareness of the responsible use of chemicals. The fabric is then tested for meeting performance like no pilling, shrinkage, colorfastness, tear strength, and thread count authenticity before being individually measured and stitched to perfection. Then it is inspected, piece by piece, to be defect free and packed as a set

ULTRA-SOFT COTTON SHEETS WITH LUSTROUS SATEEN WEAVE - Give into the look and feel of hotel-like bed sheets and smooth pillowcases with our sheet set. Made of 100% natural and sustainable long-staple cotton with 400 threads per inch, and lustrous sateen weave, the premium cotton sheet sets are densely woven to be long-lasting, ultra-soft, and authentic, unlike cheap microfiber sheets with a lower thread count which look worn out and tear easily after few washes

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - Our products are backed by incredible customer service to make sure your satisfaction is guaranteed. If for any reason you don't love our bedsheets, you can return them within 30 days for a full refund as per Amazon guidelines. Our high-quality designs match any decor and make the ultimate gift idea for men and women, Moms and Dads, Valentine's - Mother's - Father's Day and Christmas. Best for any room in your house - bedroom, guest, kids room, vacation home

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars15,813 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: 100% Natural Cotton, Soft and Comfy Sateen Sheets, Free from Harmful Chemicals
specifications.Import Designation: Eco-friendly & healthier than dust trapping artificial microfiber sheets. Imported
